att._comment: Attributes are immutable once set, typically at factory
att._ppid: PAYG Device ID. Factory set. Field override options.
att._flid: Fleet ID. Factory set. Field override options.

cmd._comment: Commands are values writed by external client.  Also readable
cmd._gstw: GPRS Sleep Time Window in mins, _gstw > _gctw
cmd._gctw: GPRS Connect Time Window in mins, _gctw <  _gstw
cmd._swch: Generic device switch swch = ON | OFF
cmd._read: Last read request of ANY GATT <data> = [opid|...|]
cmd._rptm: Set notification request <mode> = [0|1|2|3|4], 0: Auto-Periodic | 1 = Request-Response | 2 = Change-Notification

sts._comment: States are discrete state variables.  All Omnivoltaic devices share common state set. Read only
sts._time: Device internal timer readout at last communication
sts._plat: Device GPS Latitude,Positioning of telecom operator base stations
sts._plon: Device GPS Longitude,Positioning of telecom operator base statons

dta._comment: Motorcycle Battery and Controller specific data available for clients. Read only
dta._batp: Battery Net Charging Power W, the pckv * pckc
dta._inpp: Total Input Power W, the charge current * pckv
dta._outp: Output Power W,the discharge current * pckv
dta._aeng: Accumulated Energy Output in Whs. =(1-rsoc) * 72 * fccp
dta._pckc: Pack Current in mA.The charging current is negative, and the discharge current is positive
dta._rsoc: Relative State of Charge,Percentage of fccp
dta._pckt: Pack Temperature C.Average of all effective Battery temperature
dta._acyc: Accumulated Cycles.Number of PACK charging and discharging cycles

dia._comment1: Motorcycle Battery specific diagnostics available service personnel. Read only
dia._comment2: The voltage of each string of motorcycle batteries. The NMC battery is 20 strings, and the LFP battery is 23 strings
